keyMoments.title: Hody Betrays Vander Decken
keyMoments.description: Hody Jones defeats his ally Vander Decken IX, ending their alliance and demonstrating his willingness to eliminate anyone who is no longer useful.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the ruthless nature of the crew's leadership.

keyMoments.title: Hyouzou's Energy Steroid Overdose
keyMoments.description: Crew member Hyouzou becomes extremely powerful and dangerous after consuming too many Energy Steroids, attacking allies and enemies indiscriminately.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's reliance on Energy Steroids and the risks involved.

keyMoments.title: Nuru Killed by Hyouzou
keyMoments.description: The steroid-enhanced Hyouzou kills fellow crew member Nuru after his defeat by Zoro.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the chaotic danger that the Energy Steroids pose even to crew members.

keyMoments.title: Wadatsumi Enhanced by Energy Steroid
keyMoments.description: Zeo manipulates Wadatsumi into taking an Energy Steroid, greatly enhancing his combat abilities.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's tactical use of Energy Steroids to boost their forces.

jollyRoger: A skull with a crown and fish-man features

formation.purpose: Overthrow the Ryugu Kingdom and enact fish-man supremacy

notes: Episode 560 shows the crew's heavy reliance on Energy Steroids and the chaos it creates, including internal casualties.
